name: Task
about: Generic template for investigation or implementation work
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

## Summary  
Describe what needs to be investigated or implemented and why. Include the expected outcome (e.g., recommendation, working code, integration, documentation).

## Background  
Provide relevant context or motivation. Link to related issues, design documents, or prior benchmarks if applicable.

## Scope  
Define what should be done and what is explicitly out of scope. Mention the main components and languages affected.

## Deliverables  
List concrete outputs expected from this task, such as:  
- Working implementation or prototype  
- Report or recommendation  
- Tests, benchmarks, or documentation updates  
- Follow-up tickets if required  

## Acceptance Criteria  
- Task outcome verified (e.g., code runs, report reviewed, or benchmarks validated)  
- Rationale for design or implementation choices included  
- Linked references and related discussions documented  

## References  
(Optional) Include useful links, docs, prior issues, or relevant research.
